Chile: Almagro's expedition crosses the Andes into the Copiapó River valley and explores the central region of Chile as far south as the Aconcagua River valley.

Almagro sends an expedition under :es:Gómez de Alvarado southwards toward the Bio-Bio region. The expedition ends in the Battle of Reynogüelén, considered to be the first battle of the Arauco War, with native Mapuches near the Itata River.
